argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_sopo | |- ( R Or A -> R Po A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_frfi | |- ( ( R Po A /\ A e. Fin ) -> R Fr A ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R Or A /\ A e. Fin ) -> R Fr A ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R Or A /\ A e. Fin ) -> R Or A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-we | |- ( R We A <-> ( R Fr A /\ R Or A ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( R Or A /\ A e. Fin ) -> R We A ) |
